title: Harvest Hustle
shortDescription: Fast-paced farming simulation with time management challenges
longDescription: Harvest Hustle combines the relaxing nature of farming with intense time management gameplay. Plant, grow, and harvest crops while managing resources and racing against the clock. Features multiple seasons, weather challenges, and crop varieties that will test your agricultural skills.
features: 10+ crop varieties with unique growth patterns

title: Kenny's Khaos
shortDescription: Chaotic arcade action with Kenny causing mayhem across multiple worlds
longDescription: Join Kenny on his wildest adventure yet! Navigate through increasingly chaotic levels filled with obstacles, enemies, and physics-defying challenges. With its unique art style and over-the-top gameplay, Kenny's Khaos delivers non-stop entertainment.

title: Tiny Cafe
shortDescription: Cozy cafe management game with charming pixel art
longDescription: Run your own tiny cafe in this heartwarming management simulation. Serve customers, create delicious recipes, decorate your space, and build relationships with regular patrons. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities to grow your business.

title: Void Breaker
shortDescription: Space-themed brick breaker with modern twists and power-ups
longDescription: Experience the classic brick breaker genre like never before. Void Breaker takes you through the depths of space with stunning visuals, challenging level designs, and innovative power-ups that completely change how you play.

title: Timmy's Revenge
shortDescription: Platformer adventure where Timmy seeks justice in a colorful world
longDescription: Help Timmy on his quest for revenge in this challenging 2D platformer. Jump, dash, and fight your way through beautifully crafted levels filled with secrets, enemies, and memorable boss encounters.

title: Honey Haven
shortDescription: Bee colony management simulator with ecological themes
longDescription: Build and manage your own bee colony in this educational and entertaining simulation game. Learn about bee behavior while expanding your hive, collecting nectar, and protecting your colony from various threats.

title: CapsuleWars
shortDescription: Strategic capsule battles with customizable units and tactics
longDescription: Command your capsule army in this strategic battle game. Customize your units, develop tactics, and engage in epic battles across diverse battlefields. Every decision matters in this deep strategy experience.

title: Cardmageddon
shortDescription: Card-based strategy game with apocalyptic themes
longDescription: Survive the cardmageddon in this strategic card game where every decision could be your last. Build powerful decks, manage resources, and outlast your opponents in this post-apocalyptic card battler.

title: Capture & Conquest
shortDescription: Territory control game with real-time strategy elements
longDescription: Capture territories and build your empire in this engaging strategy game. Balance resource management, military tactics, and diplomatic relations to achieve total conquest.

title: Wobbly Wiggles 1
shortDescription: The original physics-based party game that started it all
longDescription: The game that launched the Wobbly Wiggles franchise! Experience the original physics-based party game that brings friends together for hilarious multiplayer mayhem.

title: Wobbly Wiggles 2
shortDescription: The sequel with enhanced physics and new game modes
longDescription: Building on the success of the original, Wobbly Wiggles 2 introduces enhanced physics, new characters, and exciting game modes that take the party game experience to the next level.

title: Wobbly Wiggles 3: Ultimate Racers (Diamond Version)
shortDescription: The ultimate racing experience in the Wobbly Wiggles universe
longDescription: The Diamond Version of Wobbly Wiggles 3: Ultimate Racers brings the franchise into the racing genre with spectacular results. Experience wobbly physics racing like never before with exclusive Diamond content.

title: Wobbly Wiggles 3: Ultimate Racers (Onyx Version)
shortDescription: The premium Onyx edition with exclusive content and features
longDescription: The Onyx Version of Wobbly Wiggles 3: Ultimate Racers includes all Diamond content plus exclusive Onyx features, making it the definitive racing experience in the Wobbly Wiggles universe.

title: McDonald's Advergame
shortDescription: Custom promotional game created for McDonald's marketing campaign
longDescription: A fun and engaging promotional game developed in partnership with McDonald's. This advergame combines entertainment with brand awareness, featuring McDonald's characters and themes in an accessible gaming experience.

title: From The Shadows
shortDescription: Dark atmospheric horror game with stealth mechanics
longDescription: Navigate through dark, atmospheric environments in this psychological horror game. Use stealth and wit to survive encounters with otherworldly entities that lurk in the shadows.

title: Cancer Crusher
shortDescription: Educational game raising awareness about cancer prevention and treatment
longDescription: An educational and empowering game designed to raise awareness about cancer prevention, treatment, and support. Combines engaging gameplay with important health information in a respectful and informative manner.
